alert.note: Alert for San Diego (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 15 at 2:50PM PDT until October 15 at 6:15PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 449 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Southwest California, including the following counties, Riverside and San Diego. * WHEN...Until 449 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 250 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Borrego Springs, Hwy 78 Between S2 And Borrego Springs Rd, Anza, Hwy 78 Between Borrego Springs Rd And Ocotillo Wells, Borrego Palm Canyon, Hwy S22 Between Ranchita And Borrego Springs, Hwy 74 Between Anza And Palm Desert, Hwy S22 Between Borrego Springs And Imperial County Line and Hwy 74 Between Mountain Center And Anza. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
